## Authenticator

[middlewares/authentication/Authenticator.js:12-108][38]

Class for Authenticator.

### validateSlackApiAppId

[middlewares/authentication/Authenticator.js:24-36][39]

Function to validate slack Api app ID.
This method won't be called in case of slash command routes routes. This will be called only for interactive routes.

#### Parameters

*   `req` **[object][35]** 
*   `res` **[object][35]** 
*   `next` **[function][36]** 

Returns **[Promise][40]\<void>** 

### validateSlackChannel

[middlewares/authentication/Authenticator.js:48-60][41]

Function to validate slack channel.
This method won't be called in case of interactive routes. This will be called only for slash commands routes.

#### Parameters

*   `req` **[object][35]** 
*   `res` **[object][35]** 
*   `next` **[function][36]** 

Returns **[Promise][40]\<void>**

## extractResponseUrlFromBody

[middlewares/extractResponseUrlFromBody.js:11-16][49]

Extract response_url from slash commands. This middleware should only be used with slash commands.

### Parameters

*   `req` **[object][35]** 
*   `res` **[object][35]** 
*   `next` **[function][36]** 

## extractResponseUrlFromPayload

[middlewares/extractResponseUrlFromPayload.js:10-15][50]

Extract response_url from interactive routes. This middleware should only be used with interactive routes.

### Parameters

*   `req` **[object][35]** 
*   `res` **[object][35]** 
*   `next` **[function][36]** 

## extractSlackParams

[middlewares/extractSlackParams.js:11-30][51]

*   `res` **[object][35]** 
*   `next` **[function][36]** 

## extractText

[middlewares/extractText.js:11-16][52]

Extract text from slash commands. This middleware should only be used with slash commands.

### Parameters

*   `req` **[object][35]** 
*   `res` **[object][35]** 
*   `next` **[function][36]** 

## extractTriggerId

[middlewares/extractTriggerId.js:12-18][53]

Extract trigger_id from interactive routes. This middleware should only be used with interactive routes.
This middleware will not fetch triggerId for view_submission type interactions.

### Parameters

*   `req` **[object][35]** 
*   `res` **[object][35]** 
*   `next` **[function][36]** 

## \_preprocessSlackPayload

[middlewares/formatPayload.js:11-36][54]

Parse and regex replace processed links and user mention in slack payload.

### Parameters

*   `params` **any** 

Returns **([string][55] | [boolean][56] | [number][57] | [Array][58])** 

## formatPayload

[middlewares/formatPayload.js:45-55][59]

Convert string to JSON.

### Parameters

*   `req` **[object][35]** 
*   `res` **[object][35]** 
*   `next` **[function][36]** 

## parse

[middlewares/parseApiParams.js:21-68][60]

Function to get view submission parameters.
This method won't be called in case of slash command routes routes. This will be called only for interactive routes.

### Parameters

*   `req` **[object][35]** 
*   `res` **[object][35]** 
*   `next` **[function][36]** 

Returns **[Promise][40]\<void>**
